column1: NGR is from 1950s record and is the Royal Infirminary. Stated altitude of 211 is wrong, OS figure used, there is no suggestion that the guage is on a roof of a building. Gauge moved around  hospital site a bit and was about 100m SW, altitude 190m, in the early years to 1936
1952 and 1960 readings removed because record has omit written over them with a note about suspected estimation. The 1960s readings are duplicates of the All Saints record.
